sys_script.name: Workato_Updated_incident_1236869

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_447d8c941ba21010a8a97596cc4bcb09

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description>Workato Updated incident notifier for recipe ID 1236869</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Workato_Updated_incident_1236869</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[    notifyWorkatoEvent();
    function notifyWorkatoEvent() {
      var notifier = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
      var payload = new global.JSON().encode(convertCurrentToJSON());
      var sub_domain = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
      notifier.setHttpMethod('post');
      notifier.setEndpoint('https://www.workato.com/webhooks/notify/service_now?uuid=3e3XHe6xrEkqj2ASK5zEeQ' + "___" + sub_domain);
      notifier.setRequestHeader('X-Workato-User-Id', '86134');
      notifier.setRequestHeader('X-Workato-User-Signature', '10d17901552b9cc7a89dd57aeb24d133aaafdecaf488ebd59caf7a1b8259c1f5');
      notifier.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
      notifier.setRequestBody(payload);
      notifier.executeAsync();
    }

    function convertCurrentToJSON() {
      var fields = new GlideRecordUtil().getFields(current),
        resultObject = {},
        field;
      for (field in fields) {
        resultObject[fields[field]] = current.getValue(fields[field]);
      }
      return resultObject;
    }
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-06 09:23:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>447d8c941ba21010a8a97596cc4bcb09</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Workato_Updated_incident_1236869</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_447d8c941ba21010a8a97596cc4bcb09</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-06 09:23:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=447d8c941ba21010a8a97596cc4bcb09"/></record_update>
